overview:
CEO and Founder of Headliner.fm

Headliner is social recommendation platform which disrupts social marketing. For the first time marketers can reach and engage a highly target audience in the news feed on Facebook and Twitter without having to have them like or follow them first.

Headliner rewrites the rules of social marketing marketing true authentic scalable social recommendations.

CEO and Founder of Nabbr.com.

Nabbr (www.nabbr.com), the leading Gen Y online broadcast network.Nabbr is in the top 10 on comScoreâ€™s March 2009 Video Metrix Key Measures Report, which rates online video content viewership. The report firmly establishes Nabbrâ€™s video network as the 5th most popular destination for Internet video viewers aged 12-24, and the 9th most popular video destination across all age groups.

With a focus on marketing to Generation Y, Nabbr broadcasts online video through a proprietary network of more than 400 social networking resource sites. Nabbr shares the comScore Top 10 with some of the largest players in Internet video including Google, Fox Interactive Media, HULU.com, Yahoo!, Microsoft, Viacom Digital, CBS Interactive, Turner Network, and Disney.
